K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45a-31: khrag mang po ni btung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-0: yi ge dang @45b po aom dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-1: spyi bor thig le ldan byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-2: 'og gi phyogs su ra yis gdags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-3: au 'dren pa ros brgyan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-4: 'di ni kho bo'i snying po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-5: mchog tu thams cad las byed pa'o; ;gsod pa dang ni 'dren pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-6: dbang dang dbang rnams byed la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-7: de la sogs pa'i las gzhan yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-8: tshul bzhin sbyar bas byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-9: shi ba bzhin du mig btsums nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-10: rang gi lus ni bskum byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-11: bum pa lnga mtha'i sbyor ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-12: dgra rnams thams cad gsad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-13: nga ro dang po yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-14: bdag nyid ngo bo thams cad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-15: sangs rgyas chen po bsgoms byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-16: zhi ba'i 'od zer sprin phung spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-17: de yi lus ni zhi bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-18: de yi sems can thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-19: tsha ba gdon dang dug la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-20: sdug bsngal mkha' 'gro'i mche ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-21: 'jigs pa thams cad bral bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-22: shes rab pha rol phyin mnyam gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-23: bdag nyid kyis ni tshul bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-24: 'di yis thams cad nang gi rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-25: sdug bsngal dogs par 'phrog par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-26: de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-27: nam mkha' sa steng las kyi rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-28: snying gar rdo rje sems dpa' bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-29: yid bzhin thams cad byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-30: myur du rdo rje slob dpon la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-31: sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:45b-32: gus la zhes sar bcas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46a-2: nam yang rdo rje slob dpon gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46a-3: sems ni dkrug par mi bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46a-4: ci ste shes rab 'chal phas byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46a-5: myur du na rak lhung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46a-6: nad dang 'tshe ba dgra dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46a-7: gdon dang tsha ba dug nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46a-8: slob dpon zhabs la smod byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46a-10: bla ma las ni dngos grub 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46a-11: bla ma mtho ris bla ma bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46a-12: de bas nan tan thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46a-13: bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46a-16: thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje dam tshig dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46a-18: thugs rdo rje mchog gsang ba sbas pa chen po zla gsang thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor te bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-0: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs dang @46b rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-1: nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi g-yog rnams mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-2: ca co 'byin cing dbyangs chen po brjod par gyur to; ;kye ma'o rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-3: rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-4: sna tshogs thabs ni bde byed che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-5: sna tshogs ye shes bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-6: kye ma kun tu bzang po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-7: dge ba'i ye shes bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-8: gang bde phyir ni rig ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-9: padmo las ni gnas pa mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-10: kye ma'o rig pa shin tu zab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-11: shes rab pha rol phyin pa bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-12: sems can kun la shes rab kyi; ;mun pa'i thibs po sel bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-13: kye ma'o thams cad ngo mtshar che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-14: mkha' 'gro'i dra bas gar mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-15: snom par mdzad dang myang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-16: mnye ba dang ni 'phrog pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-17: ae ma'o shin tu rab tu dgyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-18: skal ldan skal la sprod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-19: sna tshogs skal bas bde byed che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-20: sna tshogs rdo rje shin tu mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i 'dod pa'i lha shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po la gnas pa la rnal 'byor ma thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:46b-22: mchog gi pha rol phyin ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo thams cad rang gi gdan las bzhengs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47a-0: shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen @47a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47a-1: po'i 'gying ba'i 'dud pas phyag byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47a-2: shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba 'thob par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya chen po 'dis mnyes bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47a-3: sgyu ma'i bde bas nam mkha' kun tu gang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47a-4: sprul pa'i rang bzhin skye ba mchog gi bde bsten te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47a-5: rjes su chags pa'i padma dga' bas kun khyab cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47a-6: chos kyi bde ba nyid kyang kun tu btang snyoms mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47a-8: 'di lta'i gzugs ma bde mchog dpal dang rnam ldan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47a-9: byams ma'i phyogs su mi gtong ye shes nyid kyis 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47a-10: 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di rnams chos nyid rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47a-11: dug gsum dbang du mdzad cing mos pa rnams mi bskyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47a-12: ngo mtshar phyogs dang ma bral byang chub snying por bgrod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan rgyas pas 'khor de dag thams cad la yud tsam kun tu gzigs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47a-14: rdo rje padmo dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dpal chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te cang mi gsung bar mnyam par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47a-17: dbugs rab tu gtong bar mi mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47a-19: kun tu rnam par mi gzigs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47b-2: rnam par rtog pa'ang mi mdzad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47b-3: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shin tu bde ba chen pos nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad shin tu khyab par shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba las btsal te rgyas par mdzad pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47b-4: der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad drangs bcug bcings dbang du byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47b-5: 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyis mnyes par byas te bzhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47b-7: yang nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gzigs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47b-8: bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47b-9: gnyis su med par longs spyod pa dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47b-10: bskul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47b-11: byang chub kyi sems chen po la'ang thim par gyur pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47b-12: khams gsum 'dir dam pa'i chos ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47b-14: bstan pa la gnas par byed pa 'ga' yang med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47b-21: rab tu gdug pa chen por sems pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:47b-24: gti mug gi mun pas bsgribs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48a-2: gzhan gyi bud med kyis 'chums pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48a-3: chig rtsub mo la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48a-4: nye ba'i nyon mongs pas gzhan la gtses pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48a-5: gcig gi sha gcig gis za ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48a-6: thabs med pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48a-9: zhes sngon gyi smon lam las kyi stobs la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gzigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48a-11: shes rab kyi thugs rje'i smon lam chen po nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu yang dag par gnas pa 'di lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu brlag par gzigs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba yang dag par zhugs pa kun tu bzang po chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis bskul ba mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48a-13: ho: rang bzhin dag pa dag pa padma bde ba'i mchog mnga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48a-14: thugs kyi yid bzhin rin chen gzhan la dgongs nas bzhengs mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48a-15: bskal pa mtha' nas bsgrubs pa'i byams pas gzugs kyis brjid pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48a-16: byang chub snying po'i chu des 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin khrus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48a-18: padmo'i 'byung gnas bde gshegs kun gyi skal ba mchog dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-0: sdug @48b bsngal nad kun sel ba'i thugs rjes 'jig rten gsum la gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-1: dga' ba'i rol pas gar dang bcas te bzhengs shing dbang du mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-3: sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bsgrags gsang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-4: 'gro ba kun gyi yid dang 'thad pa'i gsang chen 'di phyung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-5: rnam dag spyod yul gzhan gyi mi 'phrogs nam mkha' la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-6: dngos med rol mo'i gzhan las 'phang pa bzhengs shing mdzad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-8: skad cig ma yi spyod yul 'dis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-9: mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-10: gzhan la thugs rjes dgongs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-11: lha rnams byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-12: dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-13: dgyes mchog dam pa bskul byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-14: padmo dra ba rdo rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-15: bde bar sbyor bar bzhengs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-16: bde ba chen po bde gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-17: gtso la 'di yis bskul ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-18: sems can kun don bzhengs 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-19: rgyal ba thams cad gdon par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje 'dzin yang dag pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba chen pos brgyan pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:48b-21: bzhengs nas phyogs bcu mtha' yas rab 'byams mthas klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun gzigs nas ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams dang bral bas gdug pa thams cad kyis 'di dag nye bar gtses //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49a-9: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par zos zhes dgongs pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49a-10: bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtong ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi bde ba chen po dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49a-13: thugs rdo rje ye shes bde ba chen po'i rang gi rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49a-14: padmo las byang chub kyi sems nye bar bsdu bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49a-17: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49a-18: thog mar aom ni thig ler bsam byas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' bcas pa 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49a-20: mi phyed 'dren pa yang dag gnyis dang ldan pa ste; ;'di ni ston pa'i mchog ste rdo rje'i rigs nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49a-21: phyung nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du gang ba'i spro bas snang bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49a-22: slar yang 'dus nas rdo rje lta bur gnas so; ;yang spro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49a-23: bsdu ba byas nas slar 'dus pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49a-26: thugs rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-0: shar gyi @49b dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs par gyur pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-1: h'um h'um h'um zhes bzhad pa chen por bzhad cing aa zhes brjod nas bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-2: rang gi sems dpa'i skyil mos g-yon du yid tsam 'gying bas 'dud pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-3: g-yas kyi rdo rje gsor zhing 'dzum dang bcas shing spyan rgyas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-4: che ba'i chen po dbu lnga pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-5: phyag ni bcu drug rnams dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-6: sna tshogs sku ni mchog 'dzin pa; ;dpa' bo thams cad las byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-7: kha dog rnam lnga gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-8: mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-9: rdo rje sgyur mar rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-10: mkhas pa gang gis snying ga nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-11: mnyam par bzhag ste 'dzin byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-12: rdo rje padmo bde che yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' bde myur 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkhar 'gro ma kun longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-17: thugs rdo rje las mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zla gsang thig le las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-18: nam mkha' shin tu dgyes pa 'thob par byed pa'i bde ba chen po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-19: aom yig gtsug tu thig le ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-20: mi phyed thig ler bcas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-21: 'og tu gzi brjid yang dag bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-22: mthar ni dral te chog drag bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:49b-23: 'dir ni rin chen thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50a-0: snying po mchog tu rmad byung @50a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50a-2: phyung ba yis ni nam mkha' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50a-3: sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50a-4: 'od zer sprin phung rgyas byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50a-5: slar yang de nyid bzhugs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50a-6: de yi thugs kar zhugs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50a-7: brda yi tshul gyis bzhugs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50a-8: rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50a-9: sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50a-10: kha dog rnam lnga yangs pa'i spyan //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50a-33: kye ma'o bde bas dbang bskur bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-0: @50b de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po mchog tu bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa'i 'dod ba'i dbang gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-4: dang por aom dang ldan byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-5: mi phyed rab btags 'dren pa bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-6: tsheg drag pa ni sngags yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-7: bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-8: sngags mkhan gang gis mnyam gzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-9: snying gar 'di ni sbyar byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-10: bdag ni 'dod chags zhen sems shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-11: padmo sbyar bas bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-12: mtshams kyi mtha' ma dus dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-13: dam tshig 'di ni spyad byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-14: zla ba phyed kyi nang logs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-15: dbang phyug mo ni dngos grub 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-16: padmo che las byung nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-17: thams cad du ni rgyas 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-18: 'di nyid du ni slar zhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-20: kun tu snang bas khyab byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-21: sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-22: de nas 'dod chags babs nas kyang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-24: dkyil 'khor du ni gang ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:50b-25: rgyab nas rjes su mnyes mdzad cing //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51a-3: phyag ni nyi shur bzhis ma gtams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51a-4: mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51a-5: sna tshogs rgyan gyis klubs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51a-6: zla ba bzhin du rnam grol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51a-7: brjid pas gar ni mdzad cing bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51a-10: dpal ldan gar dbang thob 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51a-11: 'dod chags kun gyi thabs gnas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51a-12: 'jam pa'i phyag ni stong rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po kun tu bzang pos yang sna tshogs chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51a-18: sna tshogs chen po ao chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51a-19: steng du thig ler yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51a-21: sngags kyi mchog ni gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51a-22: sna tshogs 'di ni thugs kar grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51a-23: sna tshogs phyung nas kun snang bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51a-24: sangs rgyas tshul bzhin kun mnyes byas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51a-26: sna tshogs rdo rje gzugs mchog gnas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-1: rnam pa sna tshogs bzhad pas brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-3: sna tshogs gzi brjid 'bar ba gtong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-4: phyag ni brgyad gnyis gnyis kyis phyogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-5: kha byed sna tshogs mtshon cha gtong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-6: zhal lnga sna tshogs yangs che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-7: bgegs spong thams cad dngos grub mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-8: dkyil 'khor gang bar bzhag nas byang du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-9: sna tshogs rdo rje bdag mor rdo rje yang dag gis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-13: sna tshogs las ni sna tshogs byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-15: dbyangs chen po len cing dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das la mnyes pa mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-16: gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-17: ye shes lnga yi ngo bo dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-18: rgyal ba nyid kyis bshad par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-19: sangs rgyas sku la bstod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-20: sngags rigs phyag rgya yan lag bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-21: lha yi de nyid pha rol phyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-22: bdag ni de nyid sna tshogs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-23: sna tshogs ye shes bstod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-24: gzungs kyi padmo yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-25: 'dod byed thugs kyi mchog yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-26: shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:51b-27: sbyor ba'i ye shes bstod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:52a-0: @52a *// chos kyi don ni gnyis med tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:52a-1: stong pa nyid kyi lam rig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:52a-2: yangs pa'i spyan ni so sor gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:52a-3: me long ye shes yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:52a-4: bya ba nan tan sems can don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:52a-5: rang gi yon tan mi mnyam shod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:52a-6: de nyid rig pas sems can kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:52a-7: rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:52a-8: gang gis byin gyis brlabs ma thag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:52a-9: sangs rgyas gsum ni dbang du 'gyur //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:52a-15: stong pa chen po'i snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:52a-18: aom badzra w'a ka a'a:aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa tram/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:52a-19: aom badzra sa ma ya ho:de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shin tu mgu /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:52b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dge'o zhes bde ba chen po'i @52b tshul gyis rab tu spro bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:52b-6: nyid kyi snying gar drangs byas te //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:52b-19: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta mah'a pra tya pra pa ksha dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma konyaham/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:53a-24: gsang ba bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:53b-2: gtso bo chen po nyid kyis shod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:53b-3: dkyil 'khor mi mnyam ye shes ni //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:53b-27: rdo rje chos kyi btsun mo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:53b-28: de sbyin dga' byed ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-0: @54a *// bzod pa chen mo byang du ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-1: bsod pa'i bdag nyid zad pa sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-2: btsun mo rdo rje gdon mi za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-3: dam tshig gnas ni skyong byed ma'i //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-9: slob ma mchog ni gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-10: phyag rgyas lag pa brgyan byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-12: rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par klubs //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-15: dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-16: mig ni dar gyi gos nyid kyis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-18: sgo yi grva ra yang gzhag bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-19: smon lam mchog ni smra ru gzhug /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-22: rang dgyes gnas las byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-23: bde byed chen mos mnyes par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-24: ji ltar bzhin du mnyam nyid 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-25: me tog phreng ba dor byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-26: lha mo chen mo bzhes su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-28: lha mo gang la lhung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-29: de yi lag nas bskor ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-30: lha mo 'di ni khyod dang mthun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-31: sems che khyod kyis 'dod par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54a-32: de nas slob ma de yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-0: bdag @54b rab dgyes smra bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-1: de la 'dod pa spyad par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-2: khro bo rnams kyi mi phyed phad//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-3: mtha' ni ho:zhes sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-4: 'byung ba'i dus su bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-5: aa ho su kha bde zhes smra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-6: nas rdo rje phyung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-7: mkhas pas de ni blang byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-8: bde ba chen po dngos grub rdzas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-9: bla ma la ni dang por dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-10: de nas de nyid kun la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-11: ci bde bar ni dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-12: spyi lam zhabs la btugs byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-13: bla ma la ni dbang blang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-14: shin tu sbas pa'i 'phags pa'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-15: bcom ldan bdag la stsal bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-16: de nas sbyor ba chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-17: snyoms par sngags [?] te bde ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-18: slob dpon rdo rje phyung byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-19: spyi bor rab tu gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-20: lag pa yis ni ma reg par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-21: kha la rab tu sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-22: khyad par du ni drang byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-23: ci bde bar ni btung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-24: gzungs ma de dag thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-25: rdo rje yis ni sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-26: de nas slob ma mchog nyid kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-27: bla ma la ni yon dbul bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-28: ma dang sring mo bu mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-29: chung ma dang ni rang gi [?] bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-30: bdag nyid dang ni rgyal srid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-31: de bzhin longs spyod dbang phyug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-32: rdzas dang nor dang gter rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-33: glang po rta dang shing rta dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-34: bla ma la ni yon mchog ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-35: dga' ba'i yid 'gyur dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-36: phyi yi sbas la gsang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:54b-38: rdo rje dang ni gzungs ma'i rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-1: pa'i dngos grub dri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-2: snying po yang dag shes gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-3: dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-6: ci ste rmongs pas smra byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-7: slob dpon gyi ni dam tshig nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-8: myur du zla phyed tshun chad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-10: dang por dam tshig gzhag byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-11: phyi nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-12: gzhan du byas na dpa' bo'i rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-13: dmyal bar bskal bar grangs med smin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-14: de bas blo ldan rdo rje yis; ;nan tan dam tshig bsgrag mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-15: sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-16: dam tshig srung la brtson par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-17: gzhan du byas na sngags mkhan gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-18: sngags la sogs pa'i don mi 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-19: lha rnams kyang ni dam tshig gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-20: gsol yang bzhes su mi gnang ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-22: 'jig rten pha rol dmyal ba'i rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-23: dam tshig spyod pa 'das pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-24: rmongs pa'i bdag nyid des 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-25: slob ma de yang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-27: des na sngags kyi don mi smin; ;lha rnams kyi ni mchog tu bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-28: dam tshig med pa'i slob ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-29: nam yang sbyin par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55a-30: de bas dam tshig gtso yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-0: thog mar dam tshig sbyin @55b par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-1: sngags rnams dang ni phyag rgya yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-2: de bzhin thabs dang shes rab rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-3: dam tshig de rnams thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-4: sngags pas gsang ba sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-5: dmyal ba ngan song bzlog pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-6: bu dang slob ma sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-7: sngags kyi dngos grub bsod nams byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-8: gtsang sbra dogs pa med par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-10: dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin bri byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-11: gzhon nu'i tshad ni bcu drug lon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-12: dam tshig slob ma'i dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-13: bzhag nas cho ga 'dis gzhug bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-14: dam tshig rnams ni 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-15: sbrang rtsi sha dang dri chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-16: nyi ma zla ba'i blo chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-17: rdo rje las byung chu bsgrubs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-18: dkyil 'khor la sogs tshul bzhin gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-19: dam tshig yi ge bzhag pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-20: myur du dam tshig 'grub byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-21: dga' byed dam tshig dngos grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-23: dam tshig 'di ni sna tshogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-24: 'dzin pa yis ni mthu ru 'gyur; ;ma 'ongs sangs rgyas chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-26: blo ldan dbang bskur blangs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-27: dbang bskur phun sum tshogs pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:55b-29: dbang bskur ba yi yid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje ye shes chen po zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dkyil @56a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu dgyes pa chen po yid bde bar gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56a-3: bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56a-4: gdug pa thams cad rnam 'dul ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56a-6: rdo rje khro bo chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56a-7: dkyil 'khor chen po rnam bshad phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56a-9: dkyil 'khor rdo rje thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56a-10: khro bo'i dam tshig ded dpon gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56a-11: gsang ba chen po nyid kyis shod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dren pa'i khro bo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56a-15: thugs rdo rje ye shes las 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56a-16: aom badzra mah'a tsand'a sarbba dushtam ta ga ha na da ha pa tsa h'um phad/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56a-17: 'di phyung ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad khro bo chen po'i mthus rnam pa drug tu g-yos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56a-27: srin po thams cad 'khrugs pa chen por gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56b-0: de nas 'jigs pa chen pos nyen pas de dag brgya byin gyi thad du @56b lhags nas brgya byin bdag nyid kyang skyabs med par mthong nas changs pa'i thad du phyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56b-1: tshangs pa yang gtogs 'dod kyi gan du phyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56b-2: gtogs 'ded kyang dbang phyug chen po'i thad du phyin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56b-3: de nas dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid kyi mthu 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs su byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus kun tu snang bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56b-8: lha ma yin rnams ma 'jigs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56b-11: 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams ma 'jigs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56b-12: nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyis khyad par 'di lta bu gzhan 'gas kyang rab tu brdzi nus sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56b-13: khyed rnams ci dgar spyod pas mnos shig ces dbugs phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i khro gnyer chen po zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56b-16: khro bo chen po'i snying po nyid kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56b-18: thugs rdo rje ye shes las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:56b-20: mah'a kro dha ha na ha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57a-1: n+yan sarbba m'a r'a na sarbba du sht'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57a-7: bhri h'um hri h'um tram trad/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57a-8: 'di brjod ma thag tu de dag snga ma bzhin du skrag nas dbang phyug chen po'i thad du nye bar lhags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57a-9: de nas dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du bdag gi che ba nye bar ston cing gtogs 'dod la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57a-10: khyod kyang mthu che ba'i lha chen po ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57a-11: gdug pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi bdag po yin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57a-12: rang gi mthu rgya chen po'i rdzu 'phrul nye bar ston pas gdug pa de rnams dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57a-13: de nas gtogs 'dod de ma thag tu rang gi mthu 'jigs byed kyi gzugs 'khor lo'i nag po chen por bsgyur nas rdo rje'i skad drag po chen po'i bgang ba'i gdangs 'byin pas 'jig rten thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po'ang khro bo chen po'i padmo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57a-15: snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu padmo'i dra ba 'char ba'i khro bo thams cad slar ldog ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57a-17: zhugs nas khro bo chen po'i snying por bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-0: thugs rdo rje'i thugs ka nas @57b phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-1: aom padma mah'a dzva la mah'a kro dha ba ta ba mu kha kha kha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-3: kh'a hi kh'a hi sarba du sht'am pra du shtam nam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-5: badzra damshto da ka ta mah'a ma ta ma ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-8: tsa pa la du rga be ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-10: mah'a badzra ba da ba mu kha pra ma tha pra ma tha h'um phad/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-13: be sha pr'a na sha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-14: h'um hr'im h'um h'um dh'i: ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-15: de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu tshangs ris chen po 'dar ye yed zhing kha bub tu 'gyel te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-17: de nas tshangs pa chen po ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-18: dbang phyug chen po la dris pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-19: lha; 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar du snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-20: de nas dbang phyug chen pos tshangs pa la bskul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-21: khyod ni sems can kun gyi gtso bo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-22: lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-23: khyod ni 'jig rten gsum na gtong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-25: rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de'i phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-26: khyod kyis gdug pa'i sems can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-27: gdug pa'i lus can thams cad brlag par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-28: de nas tshangs pas rang nyid kyi mthu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-29: tshangs pa chen po'i srin po'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-30: 'jigs byed chen po lta bur gdong bzhi pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:57b-31: me lce stong gis gzi brjid can gyi lus 'gul ba dang bcas pas bgad pa chen po 'byin pas lha'i tshogs kyi gdug pa thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58a-1: bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po'ang lha thams cad rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58a-2: rdo rje chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58a-4: thugs rdo rje'i ye shes kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo; ;aom badzra bhee ra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58a-6: sarbba dusht'am sam bhaksha ya h'um h'um phad phad/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58a-7: badzra yaksha ha na ha na h'um phad/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58a-8: de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu brgya byin gyi khang pa 'di thams cad dum bu brgyar rnam par bshig ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58a-9: ri rab kyi rtse mo'ang 'gul zhing kun tu 'khor nas gnas par gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58a-10: brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa'ang kha bub tsam du 'gyel te brgyal bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58a-11: de nas langs te dbang phyug chen po la bltas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58a-12: dbang phyug chen pos kyang bskul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58a-13: khyod ni lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58a-14: mthu che ba yin la sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang khyod la mnyes par byed pa yin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58a-15: de ltar bdag nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar ston cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58a-16: de nas lha'i rgyal po chen po brgya byin de rang nyid kyi mthu gnod sbyin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58b-0: srin po chen po'i gzugs nye bar ston cing gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad la gdug @58b pa dag ma 'jigs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58b-1: nga'i rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bu dag mthong na sus kyang zil gyis gnon mi nus so zhes dbugs 'byin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po yang sngags kyi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58b-3: lha de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58b-5: thugs rdo rje'i ye shes las 'jug par mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58b-6: bcug nas kyang khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen por mngon par bsgyur nas bdag nyid kyang khro bo thams cad 'byin pa'i khro bo chen po'i gzugs su dmigs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58b-10: nyi ma chen po stong gis gzi brjid can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58b-11: rab tu mi bzad par byed pa'i me rlung gis bdas pa'i mdog sngon po'i sku /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58b-12: dur khrod chen po'i dpal chen gyis phyag rgya mi'i keng rus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58b-17: tshil rnams zas su gsol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58b-18: mi'i lpags pas snam logs rgyab la g-yogs te bsdams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:58b-19: mi'i mgo bo'i phreng ba dbu la 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59a-0: @59a *// stag la sogs pa'i khro bo byol song gi gdong brgya stong mang po rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas phyung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59a-1: dkyil 'khor chen po'i chul gyis shar phyogs na 'jigs byed chen po 'dul ba rnam par gnyer ba'i 'jigs pa lta bu'i spyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59a-2: zhal rdo rje'i mche ba chen po gtsigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59a-3: 'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo chen po brgya stong gi g-yog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59a-4: shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59a-5: lho'i dkyil 'khor du 'ang rdo rje khro gnyer can khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g-yog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59a-7: nub kyi dkyil 'khor du'ang padma chen po rta gdong khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g-yog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59a-8: nub kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59a-9: byang gi dkyil 'khor du 'ang rdo rje 'ur 'ur chen po'i khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g-yog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59a-11: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po'i tshogs brgya stong mang pos bskor nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59a-12: khro bo chen po'i tshogs de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59a-13: shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen pos kun tu spyod cing khro bo chen po'i rnam pa brgya stong mang po'i ri rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa snyed phyung nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59b-0: nam mkha'i dbyings rab @59b 'byams thams cad du gang bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59b-1: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang gang bar byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59b-2: de nas gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis de dag mthong nas 'jigs dngangs skyabs ma mthong nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59b-3: rang rang gi bdag po'i thad du song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59b-6: nyid kyis bdag la skyobs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59b-7: de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bdag po de dag bdag nyid kyi mthu sprul nas slar yang bslang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59b-8: 'jig rten gsum po thams cad yongs su bskor du bcug nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59b-9: 'jigs byed gdungs pa nga la skyabs su song zhes bsgo yang skyabs su 'gro ba mi len cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59b-10: slar yang rang gi rgyud kyi nga rgyal bskyed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59b-11: 'jigs byed chen po brgyad pa zhes bya ba phyung nas ri rab kyi bdag nyid chen po nye bar ston cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59b-12: dgad pa chen po'i nga ro 'byin par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59b-13: aom mah'a bhee ra ba beshtim shtim/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59b-14: tra tra tra tra tra tra tra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59b-16: 'on kyang ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse'u chung tshad tsam yang ma 'gul to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59b-17: de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo des he ru ka'i nga ro 'byin cing mgo bor mnan nas bsnun te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:59b-18: he ru kas bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs byed chen po'i nga ro 'byin cing sgyu ma'i spu gu drangs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60a-2: de'i 'khor la rab tu ston par mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60a-5: ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgren mor byas te dma' phab nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60a-6: khro bo bdag nyid kyi mthu nye bar spel cing 'khor thams cad kyang btul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60a-8: dam tshig la'ang gnas par byas te yang dag par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen po drag po bzhad cing rdo rje'i khro gnyer khro bo chen po'i zhal nas ma 'jigs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60a-10: ma 'jigs shig ces dbugs 'byin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po khro bo'i tshogs kun la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60a-12: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60a-13: mah'a tsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60a-14: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60a-17: mah'a bhee ra ba da ra ba ba h'a ri ha ra ha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60a-18: grihna grihna m'a ra m'a ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60a-22: ta ka ha na ha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60a-27: 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jigs byed chen po'i 'dul bar byed pas rang gi sku nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshad du bskyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60a-28: khro bo brgya stong mang po rnam par bsnyer ba'i zhal mche ba gtsigs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60b-0: 'khyil zhing bsgyur ba @60b phyag rgya stong mang po la mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa zhal sna tshogs mang po brgya stong me lce bzhin du rab tu 'bar ba'i sku brgya stong rnams 'jigs byed chen po ga na ba der song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60b-1: rdo rje drag po'i gad mo cher 'byin pas bzhad cing mdun na gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60b-2: aom mah'a badzra he ru ka badzra aatt'a tt'a h'a sa h'a sa ra ha ha ha ha h'um ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60b-4: de nas dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje drag po bshad pa chen po thos nas g-yog dang bcas par khas bub tu 'gyel te brgyal bar 'gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60b-5: mgo la zhabs kyis bsnun te gtong bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60b-9: ma ta ma ta kinytsi r'a ya si /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60b-10: s'urya sa ha sra ha sti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60b-11: re ka ba su r'a dza la la rtsi pra dz'a li ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60b-12: mah'a rmurti a'a kadhya a'a kadhya aa bya wa ma bya wa ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60b-13: kri na pa tsakra bhee ra pa hri da yam h'um bhrim/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60b-14: de nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po'i khro bo chen pos bzhad pas bzhad cing 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas 'khor lo can gyi mdun du ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60b-15: de nas 'khor lo can gyi 'khor 'jigs pa chen pos nyen te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60b-16: khas bub tu 'gyel te rab tu brgyal zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60b-18: bdag cag la skyobs shig ces smra zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:60b-19: skyabs med par bdag nyid kyis mthong nas 'khor lo can la skyabs su song ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-0: de nas bishnus kyang bdag nyid kyi mthu mang po @61a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-1: rab tu nye bar ston cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i mdun du gnas te rgyab la zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-4: gdug pa nye ba'i khro gnyer gyis snying dral te ji srid ma 'thungs kyi bar du de srid rang gi gnas su song zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-5: de nas khro gnyer chen po rab tu 'khrugs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-6: gtum por gyur nas de drangs te bsdams nas snying dral te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-7: de'i khrag la nyi ma'i khro gnyer chen po gnod sbyin chen po'i gdon gyi bdag nyid yang dag par chim par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-8: aom badzra ba s'urya bhri ku ti kro dha mah'a gra ha ha ra pa ta ra pa su su dhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-9: ra ma sa mad mad dza na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-10: aom bhra bhra bhrim bhrim bhra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-11: de nas 'khor lo can de sems rab tu brlag par gyur te gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-12: de'i chung ma ru ga mi ni dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-14: laksha m'i'ang g-yog dang bcas par rnam par bcom ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-15: sna tshogs rnams rnam par btul nas bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rta gdong chen po'i rgyab tu gcig bsnun nas gtong bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-17: aom badzra ba da ba mu kha kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-21: a'a ka ddhya a'a ka ddhya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-23: dam he; badzra da da ba m'a kha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-25: shva shve shve ra h'i h'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61a-26: de nas rdo rje rta gdong chen po rta skad chen po mdzad cing tshangs pa'i mdun du gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-0: de nas @61b changs ba tshangs ba'i srin po bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' bkang nas rgyu bar byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-1: de nas tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor khas bub tu 'gyel nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-4: rje cig skyobs shig ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-7: gdug pa'i gdong myur du song song /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-8: khyod kyi rgyab tu zhon te ma btul re zhes smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-9: de nas rdo rje rta gdong chen po rab tu 'khrugs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-11: tshangs pa chen po de'i mgor brdzis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-12: snying drangs nas khrag btung ba la zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-16: rus pa rnams myangs nas phyogs bcur gtor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-17: de'i chung ma shi ri ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-19: sh'anti rnams kyang rnam par bcom /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-21: dam tshig gi sdom pa la gnas par byas te bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i khro bo chen pos khros pa dang bcas pa'i lta bas gzigs te gtong bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-23: aom gu lu gu lu badzra mah'a kro dha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-25: a'a karsha ya sha kra hri da yam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-27: h'um bhaksh'a ya bhaksh'a ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-28: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po'i sku chen pos nam mkha'i ngos kun bkang ste; brgya byin gyi mdun du bzhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:61b-29: de nas brgya byin 'gying ba chen pos 'gyings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-0: mi bzad par khros par gnod sbyin chen po khyod su'i bran zhes de la @62a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-2: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-3: snying nas gtsug gi nor bu phyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-9: bza' pa rnams bza' bar zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-10: de nas de'i 'khor rnams 'jigs shing dngangs pa'i yid du gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-12: de'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyang bcom nas de'i gnas na gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen po rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-14: rol cing shin tu dgyes pa'i kun tu longs spyod pa'i khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po na bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das la bskul bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-16: aom mah'a su ra ta badzra mah'a kro dha sam ha ro pa sam ha ra sarbba kro dha ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-18: pra sha ma pra sha ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-21: sva sa ma ya mah'a manda la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-22: sth'a pa ya sth'a pa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-23: sarbba kro dha me dushta pra dushta bi ba ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-24: bi dza ya bi dza ya sha kra prahma bashnui ra ma he shva ra ma ho bha ga bam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-25: su ra ta soo khya kro dha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-26: sarbba ta th'a ga ta sattya na sa ma ye nytsa ho /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62a-27: su ra ta sa ma ya ai ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa @62b chen po khro bo chen pos khro bo thams cad 'dren pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62b-3: dbang du bya ba'i phyir nyid kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62b-5: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62b-6: ao dza: h'um bam ho: takki h'um dzdza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62b-10: a'a karsha ya kharsha kham dha ya ba sham ku ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62b-16: de nas khro bo chen po'i dam tshig de dag thams cad 'ongs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62b-17: rang gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lor 'khyil bar gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62b-18: kye; bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsol zhes smra zhing gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo'i rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo chen po phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62b-20: aom sum bha ni sum bha mah'a kro dha sha h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62b-21: de nas de dag la khyod kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa'i sems can chen po rnams gsos shig ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62b-22: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rab tu gdug pa rnams gsos zhes gsol nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62b-23: de nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:62b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pas khro bos phyag bsnol te btsir nas rdo rje bdud rtsi khro bo'i dbang mo chen mo phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63a-2: mah'a kro dhe shva ri aut shr'i ja: aut shr'i dza: badzra aa mri ti h'um aa: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma bdud rtsi chen po de dag kun tu khros te smin ma bsgyur ba'i gzigs pa'i zhal bzhad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63a-3: ru lu ru lu zhes pa'i sgra 'byin cing rang gi padmo la bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje bcug nas bdud rtsi yang dag par sgrub pa'i rig pa 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63a-4: aom aa mri ta sam dz'i ba ni mah'a mri ta mu khe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63a-5: pra be sha ya pra be sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63a-6: sarbbam badzra padma sad yo ge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63a-9: m'urti a'a; de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63a-10: gdug pa de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid kyi lus sos par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63a-11: sems dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad mthong nas ngo mtshar bar gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63a-12: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo la skyabs su dong nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63a-13: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du khro bo'i 'khor rnams gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63a-14: de nas de dag rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63a-15: bcom ldan 'das la stod par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63a-16: khyod ni sems can kun gyi yab; ;phan byed de bzhin yum yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63a-17: gtso bo 'dus pas bdag cag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63a-18: 'jigs pa che las skyob pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63a-19: rje bo sdug bsngal thams cad sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63b-0: khyod ni 'gro @63b ba'i dbang po rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63b-1: khams gsum 'di ni byed dang gtong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63b-2: che ba che khyod skye bo skyong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63b-3: thog ma med khyod nga ro thigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63b-4: nga ro'i steng ni cha yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63b-5: gtso bo yig med bdud rtsi yi; ;rab dgyes bde byed gtong ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63b-6: 'gro ba kun la phan bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63b-7: de ni sangs rgyas thams cad rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63b-8: rab dgyes 'gro la bde ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63b-9: mgon po khyod kyis gtong ba mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63b-10: sems can 'dam gyis mi gos shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63b-11: bla na med pa byang chub lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63b-12: sna tshogs sdug bsngal zhi mdzad ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63b-13: sems can sbom pa ngoms mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:63b-14: 'khor ba rba klong grol mdzad do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70a-1: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tsha bas gdungs pa yi //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70a-6: gsang ba'i bdag nyid bde bas zil mnan te; ;rmongs shing bying ba rnams la thugs rjes sgrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70a-8: che ba'i ye shes lhun gyis mngar ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70a-9: phyogs kyi thugs rjes ma zin snyoms par dgongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70a-10: bde ba mchog gi gsang ba'i gnas nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70a-11: mya ngan 'da' ba'ang longs spyod bsten las 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70a-12: 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos bstan kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70a-13: rmugs pa'i 'gro bas bdud rtsi'i dngos ma mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70a-15: ma skyes chos te snying po las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70a-16: bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70a-17: rab tu dgyes pa'i bde mchog 'bar ba'i gtso //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70b-12: khams kyi rang bzhin mnabs shing rnam khro yang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70b-14: ae ma ho bde bas bde sbyin phyag 'tshal lo //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70b-16: chags med chags dang ldan pa'i longs spyod kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70b-17: dam tshig skyon med bdag dag rol pa mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70b-18: thugs rje gsal ba'i byang chub sems chen des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70b-19: 'gro ba kun gyi bag chags rnam par sbyongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70b-20: rgyu dang rkyen lam brten rang bzhin grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70b-21: ma chags dri med yongs su gsal zla bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70b-22: 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni mnga' mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70b-23: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu bde bas brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:70b-24: 'di yis gtso la bskul byas na //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71a-4: mkha' 'gro dra ba dri med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71a-5: dgongs pa thams cad bstan byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71a-7: dngos grub thams cad sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71a-8: bde byed chen po 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71a-9: bskul bas dgyes pa sbyin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71a-10: rdo rje can gyi yi ger ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71a-11: dus gsum rab tu sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi shin tu dgyes pa'i longs spyod dpal gyi bde ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71a-13: de dag thams cad la rjes su mgu bar mdzad do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71a-15: gsang skyes padmo phye ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71a-16: rdo rje chen po g-yas nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71a-20: aom dang aom dang mi phyed rdo rje bde //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71a-22: kye ma'o bde ba mkha' 'gro dra ba che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71a-24: rnal 'byor ma tshogs gsal rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71a-25: 'di yis rtsen pa rnam byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71a-26: bde chen bde ba dgyes pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-0: rnal 'byor ma'i @71b cher rjes su mnyes bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ye shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-1: mgo la thal mo phyed sbyin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-2: chu skyes la ni yongs su rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-3: rdo rje bcings pa yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-4: padmo'i dkyil mo bcings par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-5: 'di yis rtsen par byas na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-7: bde ba chen pos gar byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-8: rab dgyes bde byed gnod byed dang; ;kun tu 'khyud dang sprod byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-9: sna tshogs gar gyis gar byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-10: thams cad zas dang ros dngos grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-11: mchog gi bde bas dngos grub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-12: rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-13: sangs rgyas sbyor ba bde chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-14: myur ba'i thal mos bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-15: gsum gyis mtshams su rab bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-16: mkhur tshos so yi sa btab byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-17: ma mchu yang nas yang du bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-19: g-ya' byed padmo rnam bzhi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-20: padmo phyi phyir rab mnye zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-21: ze ba mtshan pas rab tu sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-22: sen mos mchan khung sum mdo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-23: rna ba gnyis su rab tu gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-24: dal nas rdo rje gzhug bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-25: khro bo'i rgyal pos bskyed par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-26: g-yas kyis shin tu bskyod byas nas; ;g-yon pa yis ni gtang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-27: sbyor ba 'di yis rtsen pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:71b-29: kye ma'o bde zhes rab brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-2: yang dang yang du 'dzin pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-3: blo ldan sgrub pas bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-4: rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i spro ba ye shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-5: de dag thams cad mgu nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-7: nye ba'i zas ni thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-8: de bzhin nye ba'i yo byad rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-9: bde ba bsgrubs pas sgrub pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-10: sna tshogs chen po bsgom par gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-11: sgrub pa thams cad sgrub byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-12: gdon mi za dka' rtag bgying pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-13: gang gis myur du mnyam sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-14: dkyil 'khor rab tu rnam bsgyur bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye ba'i yo byad kha zas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-16: yo byad phyi yi thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-17: gos dang rgyan la sogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-18: nye ba'i kha zas rnams la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-19: sha dang khrag las yang dag sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-20: 'bras bu rtsa ba tshad med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-21: mchog tu bde ba yid tshim pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-22: 'di yis mchod pa byas pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-24: bus pa'i sha las rab sgrub pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-25: 'o ma dam pas thod pa dgang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-26: mkha' 'gro ma kun dbul byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-28: gtor ma'i mchod pa'i yo byad kyi ye shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72a-29: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-0: rdo rje 'dzin thams cad bzhengs @72b te phyag bcal nas yang gcig tu stug por 'du ba mdzad de bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-1: rnal 'byor kun gyi ye shes mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-2: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi; ;thams cad brda rnams dran 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro myong ba dang 'brel ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-5: rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-6: mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi brda'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-8: bdag ni 'dod can smras yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-9: gti mug ldongs pas me byin na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-10: myur du dam tshig de nyams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-11: dam tshig dam tshig can mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-12: lag pa g-yas pa brkyang byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-13: des kyang g-yon pa brkyang ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-14: rang gi nu ma rab bsdams na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-15: mgo bos g-yon du 'dud byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-16: phyag byed bde ba dris pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-17: lag pa g-yon pa dkur brten na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-18: de yis phyag ni byas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-19: g-yon pa mgo ru bzhag pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-20: g-yon du 'dud pas phyag lan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-21: g-yon gyi smin ma bskyod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-22: myur du phyag ni byas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-23: sbyor ba shin tu brtson pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-24: g-yas kyi smin mas phyag lan bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-25: g-yas kyi lag pas snying ga ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:72b-26: sbyor dang ldan pas mnye byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-1: ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-2: de yi mtshan mar shes bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-3: g-yon gyi khro mo sgreng ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-4: nam zhig de ltar bstan byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-5: lus che de ni khros 'gyur zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-6: rnal 'byor pa yi rtags zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-7: g-yon du 'gying ba bsgyings pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-8: lag par snying gar brkyang bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-9: dbang mo gyen du rnam bstan na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-10: de tshe mdza' bar rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-11: chung du rtse mor byas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-12: nam zhig bskyod pa mthong ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-13: de tshe rig ma rnal 'byor dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-15: sbom po nam zhig mthong 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-16: de la ston mo sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-17: gang tshe shin tu mthor ston na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-18: mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-19: khro mo lcags kyu 'dra byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-20: gang tshe sngags mkhan gyis bstan na; ;de tshe nges par 'o byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-21: gzhan du na ni dmyal bar ltung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-22: de nyid rnam par bzlog pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-23: sngags mkhan gyis ni ma bstan na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-24: de tshe myur du 'gro byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-25: gzhan du byas na dam tshig nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-26: gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-27: rnal 'byor pa yis rnam bskul na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-28: las kyi sbyor ba shes pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-29: las de dag ni brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-30: brda yi phyag rgya'i ye shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-31: 'dren pa med pa'i ye shes kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-32: rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73a-33: rtag tu tsheg drag rnam bral ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-0: aom ni @73b thig ler bcas pa'i brda //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-2: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-3: sbyor ba'i dkyil du brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-4: rdo rje padmo mnyam bar sbyor bas rjes su mnyes par byed pa dpal dam tshig ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po yang kun tu rgyas 'debs pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-6: rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di nyid kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-8: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-9: rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-10: sbom po skyil mo bcing bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-11: khro mo gnyis ni sbyar bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-12: lhag ma 'od bzhin btang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-13: snying gar phyag rgya 'di bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-14: thams cad las ni rab sbyar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-16: gdon mi za ba'i dngos grub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-17: thal mo de gnyis mnyam sbyar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-18: mchog dang rdo rje mnyam du sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-19: chung ngu gnyis kyang gdong sprad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-20: snying gar de bzhin sbom po sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-21: 'di yis rdo rje thams cad rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-22: dam tshig 'jigs byed rab mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-23: sems can thams cad phan mdzad ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:73b-25: de nyid las ni rdo rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-0: @74a *// mchog nyid sgreng ba'i tshul byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-1: rdo rje thal mo gnas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-2: drang ba'i tshul gyis drangs byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-3: mi g-yeng de nas dngos grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-4: gnod byed yang dag ldan pa 'dis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-6: lha dang mi yi bu mo dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-7: lha min la sogs smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-8: ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-9: 'di nyid kyis ni dngos grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-10: sngags kyi bzlas pa mnyam sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-12: thal mo de nyid las byung khro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-13: rtse mo yid tsam bkug byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-14: lhag ma 'od zer rtse mo bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-15: des ni myos byed thob pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-16: 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-17: bde bar gshegs kyang dbang bsgyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-18: yid las skyes pa 'dod chags can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-19: gti mug chos gnas smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-20: ci dgar 'dod chags sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-21: de yis las rnams byed 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-22: yang dag sbyor ba thams cad 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-23: sbyor dang mi ldan dngos grub med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-24: snying gar 'di nyid kyis byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-25: mgu ba'i sbyor ba bde chen pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-26: rgyal ba mchog ni mnyes par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-27: mchog gi bcing ba 'di kun dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-28: 'di yis las rnams thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-29: yid la bsam pa thams cad 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74a-30: phan tshun du ni mgu byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-0: mgu bas dngos grub @74b myur du thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-1: rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-2: rdo rje bkug nas sbom por sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-3: lhag ma 'od kyi tshul du gtong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-4: dga' byed mchog ni phyag rgya 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-6: rgyal srid nor dang 'bru yi rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-7: de bzhin nor bu 'di dngos grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-8: de ni de ma thag tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-9: lha dang lha min mchod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-10: bdag nyid kyis ni 'di bcings te; ;mkhas pa yis ni dus mtshams phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-11: gnas lngar rab tu sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-12: spyi bor dbang ni bskur byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-13: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-14: de nas de ni nges par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-15: lo gcig tsam du mnyam sbyar bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-16: phan tshun du ni dbang bskur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-17: khams gsum rab dgyes bdag po ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-18: blo ldan rdo rje mi g-yeng 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-19: de nyid 'khor lo bskor byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-20: snying gar 'khor lo bzhin du bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-21: zla ba gcig tsam mnyam sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-22: 'khor lo bskor ba rab tu bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-23: de nyid g-yon par rab sbyar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-24: rgyal mtshan tshul du yang dag spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-25: zhag bdun du na mnyam gzhag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-27: de nyid kha nas bgad par sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-28: mnyam gzhag zla ba gcig tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-29: las rnams thams cad rab grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-30: bgad pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-31: thal mo de nyid mnyam bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:74b-32: rtse mo kha phyed rnams bsgyur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-0: sbom po ze bar rnam byas @75a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-1: te; ;lo ma lhag ma rgyas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-3: sdig pa kun las rab tu grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-4: bsod nams chen pos byin rlab ste; ;bde byed thams cad grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-5: thal mo de nyid snying gar sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-6: mchog dang khro mi gnyis sbyar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-7: de gnyis tshig gsum rab tu dgug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-8: sbom po skyil mo tsam du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-9: rnal 'byor dag tu sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-10: 'di yi zla ba gcig byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-11: 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal rjer //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-12: dpa' bo chen por de 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-13: thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-14: rang gi snying gar bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-15: de nas sngags mkhan chos ston par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-16: mi g-yeng sems kyis de 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-17: sdom po lce yi tshul bzhag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-18: de nyid khar ni rnam bzhag na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-19: 'jig rten kun gyi thams cad dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-20: mdor na zhag bdun tsam gyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:75a-21: dbyig dang gser dang gos la sogs //
