K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:83b-10: byang chub sems ni ji ltar bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:83b-11: gang gis bde byed mchod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:83b-12: mchod pa yis ni ji ltar 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:83b-13: ji ltar gzungs dang mnyam sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:83b-15: ji ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:83b-16: bsnyen pa yis ni myur du 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:83b-17: ji ltar gsang ba mnyam sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:83b-18: rmad du byung ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:83b-19: ji ltar padmo mnyam sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:83b-21: ji ltar dri chu byang chub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:83b-22: khrag dang snang mdzad chen po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:83b-23: dam tshig nyid du ji ltar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:83b-24: ji ltar btung ba rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:83b-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen pos rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba chen mo de dag thams cad la rang gi bde bas mnyes par byas te; mi mnyam pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:83b-26: mnyam pa'i sbas pa chen po shin tu sbas pa mchog tu gsang ba'i dris lan chen po nyid kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:83b-28: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-2: sems can nyon mongs sdang byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-3: de phyir de ni rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-4: zhe sdang zhes ni bsgrags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-5: ngan song 'jigs pa chen po ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-6: sems can thams cad rmongs byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-7: de phyir 'di ni gti mug ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-8: rtag pa thub pa mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-9: thabs dang shes rab tshul nyid kyis; ;'gro ba thams cad dga' byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-10: padmo'i tshul tu rab rtogs phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-12: bde chen sbyin pa'i sprin gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-13: sems can thams cad nga rgyal bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-14: nam mkha'i bde ba bsdus pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-15: de phyir mkha' chen nga rgyal yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-16: ro la sogs pa'i mnyam sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-17: phrag dog rdo rje gdon mi za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-19: de yi phyir ni sna tshogs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-20: 'dod chags bral ba dga' med phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-21: bdag ni dgyes sbas pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-22: 'dod pa ma gtogs bde byed med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-23: bde che 'dod pa nga yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-24: 'dod chags med par byang chub med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-25: byang chub med na'ang 'dod chags med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-26: sdig pa'i nang na chags bral te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-27: sangs rgyas bde mchog mnyes byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-29: bde ba mchog tu rmad byung 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84a-30: byang chub sems med bde byed gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-1: thams cad byang chub sems ngo bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-2: bde ba kun gyis tshim par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-3: bo zhes pa ni rdo rjer bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-4: dhi zhes pa ni gzungs ma'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-5: ci zhes pa ni zag par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-6: ta zhes pa ni bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-7: mchod pa med pas bde byed med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-8: bde ba med pas mgu ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-9: mgu bas dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-10: grub na bde byed rtag pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-11: phyag na rdo rje bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-12: 'dod pa'i bde bas mchod byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-14: bde ba kun gyis gzhir gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-15: chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-16: rdo rje 'dzin phyir gzungs ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-18: 'di dang mnyam par sbyor ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-20: 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-21: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-22: sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-23: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i longs spyod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-24: de phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-25: de yis bsnyen na grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-26: sngags kyi sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-27: dbang phyug mchog gis sngags rgyal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-28: rdo rje sems kyi thugs las skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-29: mtshan can mchog tu sbas par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-30: de dang mnyam du sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-31: mchog gi dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-33: dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:84b-34: blo ldan de ru zhags gyur na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-2: dri chu byang chub dmar po'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-3: sha chen sbrang rtsi mar nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-4: lus la kun tu khyab gnas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-5: de yi phyir ni dam tshig che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-6: dam tshig 'di yis dngos grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-7: dam tshig yi ger ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-8: sbyor ces sbyang dang bskyed byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-10: de nas pha rol phyin ma kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-11: padmo'i gzigs pa rgyas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-12: 'dzum bcas g-yon nas gar mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-13: rtag pa la ni yang gsol pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-14: rigs ni rnam pa du ru bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-15: ji ltar sbas pa gsum zhes bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-16: sna tshogs chen po de dag kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-17: bde la gnas pas bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-21: thugs rdo rje las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba pha rol tu phyin ma'i de kho na nyid rab tu phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-22: nga nyid sbyor ba bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' don chen sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-24: rigs kyi khyad par lnga rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-25: sbyong bcas mi spyod rnams la rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-26: rtag pa mi bskyod rin chen mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85a-27: 'jig dbang gdon mi za grub rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-0: rigs ni rnam pa brgyad @85b bstan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-1: mdo ru bsdus na rnam pa lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-2: lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-3: khyad par theg pa rnam pa gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-4: de nyid gsum po rdo rje mnga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-5: bde ba'i gnas la rol pa mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-7: rang gi sdom pa gsol ba 'debs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-8: sdom pa dngos grub kun sbyin pa; ;brtul zhugs dka' thub sngags mkhan gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-9: dam tshig mchog tu srung ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-10: bcom ldan gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po mchog tu shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba la mngon par chags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-12: zhal rab tu bzhad pas rgyas nas nyid kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-14: thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-15: sku dang gsung dang thugs sbas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-16: nan tan du ni bsrung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-17: bsrungs pa yis ni bsod nams che; ;dngos grub shin tu skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-18: de ni 'di yis rgya che ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-19: yid kyis kha dog dbyibs chen gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-20: phyag rgya bcings la sogs pas btab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-21: sbas pa'i sku ni rab bsgrub bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-22: rdo rje gsung du rab sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-23: chos kyi ngo bo phyag rgyas brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-24: ngag sbas gsang bar brjod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:85b-25: nga ro spangs pa rdo rje'i gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-2: zla ba rdo rje rnam par sgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-3: rang bzhin gsum po gcig tu sgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-4: 'di ni yid sbas chen po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-5: 'di ni de nyid rgya chen mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-6: rgyun du sgom pa rnams byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-8: gzhan min rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-9: sbas gsum la sogs cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-10: phyag rgya thams cad rgyas btab ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-11: de bas nan tan thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-12: sbas gsum rnam par sba bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-13: rdo rje mchog 'dzin chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-14: gtso bo chen pos byin gyis rlob;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-15: blon po gang gis 'das byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-17: sems dpa' che dang bral 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-18: ngan song gsum du yang dang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-19: ji tsam nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-20: shin tu mi bzad smin par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-21: de nas dam tshig de dag kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-22: rdo rje 'dzin la mgu gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-23: 'jam po'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-24: g-yon gyis phyag byas slar gsol pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-25: gar dbang rnam gnon gnon par gar mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-26: mtha' yas phyag ni bcu pa'i bsgyings pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-27: padma'i lo ma 'jam po brgyad phye nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-28: gnyis min bde bar rdo rje 'jog mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-29: sbas pa de nyid mi mnyams sad par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86a-30: rdo rje 'dam skyes zla ba yang dag 'du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-0: thabs dang shes @86b rab dgyes pa bde byed sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-1: bde gshegs rnams kyi sbas pa nyid kyis shod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-2: sbyor dang sbyor min yang dag sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-3: zhi ba'i thal mo mchog tu bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-5: sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-6: de nas bcom ldan dam tshig rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-8: de nyid sbas pa bskul ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-10: rdo rje padmo mnyam sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-11: cho gar ldan pas gang dbang bskur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-12: bde bar 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-13: de nyid 'di ni de la bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-14: 'di la khrus med nges pa med; ;dka' thub med de dka' ba'ang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-15: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-17: lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-19: rdo rje dbab pa skyes 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-21: snying gar rdo rje khu tshur bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-22: rdo rje lta bas rnam bltas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-23: dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bsnyen byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-24: rdo rje sems dpa' skad cig 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-25: rnam sgeg dgyes pa'i rnam gnon pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-26: rab dgyes sar ni 'gro byed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-27: sangs rgyas bde ba chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-28: grub pa yis byang mchod byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-29: rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya che mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-30: 'gying ba'i langs pas gar byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:86b-32: las kyi khyad par la sogs gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-0: @87a *// sbas pa'i gar gyis gar byas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-1: sbas pa sbyor ba'i bdag nyid 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-2: sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gar byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-3: lag pa mang po rnam bsgyur dang; ;phyir brkyang dbyings su ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-4: khro bar dri med lta ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-5: gdul dka' gnon pa 'jigs byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-7: me 'bar nyi ma'i dbus nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-8: khro bo h'um mdzad bsgom byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-9: myur du 'jig rten don sgrub phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-11: lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-12: su ra ta stvam zhes smra zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-13: ha ra thig le tshul sbyar na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-14: rab dgyes de ma thag tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-15: rab dgyes mchog tu brtag pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-17: lha mo bzhi dang 'grogs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-18: sems can rnams kyi don kun byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-19: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bde ba chen po la phyag bzhes nas gsol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-20: thal mo yang dag sbyor byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-21: phyag rgya de nyid kyis shod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-22: rdo rje mchog la gsol ba 'debs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-23: bde ba'i bdag nyid mchod par shod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-24: gzugs dang sgra dang dri che dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-25: ro dang reg pa yid 'ong ba'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-26: thugs rje chen pos bsgrubs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-27: dpa' bo chen po nyid kyis shod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87a-28: de nas bcom ldan bde byed che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87b-0: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po @87b che; ;phyag rgya bcings pa bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87b-1: de nyid mchog ni bshad par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87b-2: dang po chos kyi phyag rgya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87b-3: gnyis pa dam tshig phyag rgya yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87b-4: gsum pa phyag rgya chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87b-5: bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgyar bshad //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87b-9: sna tshogs chen pos 'chad par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:87b-10: rtag pa'i sku ni ser po ste //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:88a-0: @88a *// rdo rje chen po de 'grub ste //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:88a-25: 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:88a-26: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'grub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:88a-27: de bzhin bcing ba rnam bzhag ste //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91a-26: 'gro ba thams cad dbab bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91a-27: las mchog thams cad sgrub pa pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91a-28: dgra yi rnams ni gzhig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91a-29: sbyor dang ldan pas 'bum bzlas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91a-30: las rnams thams cad byed ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91a-31: gdon mi za bar kun 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-0: rdo @91b sems dpa' bsgrub par nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-1: zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-2: khro bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-3: de nas sangs rgyas che de dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-4: sangs rgyas nyid skyes thams cad mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-5: gzugs ma rnal 'byor ma thams cad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-7: phan tshun bde ba ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-9: rang gi bde byed skyes par 'brel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-10: skal pa chen me rtsen par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs rnams la yang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dren pa'i rig ma'i snying po 'dis sdud pa mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-16: ae hye hi kaddhya bi kaddhya sarbb'anparsha ta tsakra sanytsa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-18: 'di yi phyag rgya rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-19: bcings pa gnyis ni dam byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-20: rdo rje khro mo dgrol bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-21: rdo rje'i khro ba rab sbyar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-22: rdo rje'i kyo ba zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-23: 'gro dang ri bo sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-24: phyag rgya 'di yis kun bkug ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-26: mi yi bu mo smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-27: rdo rje bcings pa mnyam gzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-28: g-yon gyi steng du de bzhin bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-29: dbus su sbom mo gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:91b-30: rdo rje 'dren pa gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-0: @92a *// rdo rje bcing pa bsdam byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-1: rdo rje sbom mo rtse mo sprad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-2: bdag ni rdo rje zhes bsgom zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-3: bcing ba de ni dgrol bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-4: de nyid bcing ba dam byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-5: dbang dang chung ngu'i rtsa ba'i mtshams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-6: rdo rje sbom mo nus byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-7: rab dgyes bdag nyid bskyod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-8: de las rdo rje mchog gnyis bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-9: mdud pa'i tshul du sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-10: gzhug pa dang ni 'dren pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-11: 'di yis thams cad dngos grub pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-13: drangs te bcug nas bcing byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-14: dbang du byas nas bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-15: de nas de dag thams cad drangs bcug bcings dga' ba bskyed nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-16: rang gi rab tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-17: rang gi rgyal srid rjes su skyong zhing rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-18: sangs rgyas kun gyi tshul chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-19: dga' byed zla gsang thig le yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-20: rab dgyes bdag nyid gsang ba 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-21: sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis zungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-22: de nas gdan las myur bzhengs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-23: thal mo sbyar te phyag bzhes nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-24: chos kyi ngo bor chig smras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-25: bde ba chen po bdag gis blangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-26: rang bde longs spyod gar byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-27: rdo rje tshe yis 'di skad smras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-28: rdo rje chos ni sna tshogs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92a-29: sna tshogs padmo gar rab byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92b-0: de nas pha rol @92b phyin de kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92b-1: rab dgyes longs spyod gar byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92b-2: bde byed chen po'i bdag nyid rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92b-3: legs pa zhes pa sbyin byed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92b-4: legs so legs so bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92b-5: legs so legs so ye shes che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92b-6: legs so legs so sna tshogs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92b-7: legs so legs so dgyes pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92b-8: bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i thugs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92b-9: pha rol tu phyin ma'i 'khor chen mo de dag mngon par dga' bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92b-10: zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92b-11: lo tstsha ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92b-12: gsung rab don rtogs slob dpon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92b-13: lhag par bkrol te bstan pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92b-14: ci rigs bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-084-001:92b-15: sems can sems bde thob par smon //
